title: Chicken salad
ingredients: ['8 chicken breast halves, skinned', '1 green bell pepper, seeded and cut into 2.5cm chunks', '1 red bell pepper, seeded and cut into 2.5cm chunks', '1 red onion, cut into 1/4 inch dice', '50g pitted black olives', '1 tin artichoke hearts', '4 leaves fresh basil', 'black pepper to taste', '6 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '6 tablespoons corn oil']
